name: 할 짓 없는 군주님
description:
'Imperator with nothing to do' is a classic strategy RPG that is very simple, but requires choice and focus.

  • Quick and simple but detailed battle
It features simple damage calculation and fast-paced combat. However, it has a combat style that makes you think about it, where every choice and turn is important.

  • Unique Universe
It takes place against the backdrop of a unique world called ‘Color World’. It features charming and unique characters and settings.

  • 100% original graphics
Everywhere you look is filled with the hands of the creator. Experience completely original retro graphics.

  • 100% original sound
The creator's heart is everywhere within earshot. Experience completely original BGM and SE.

Story

A world of color, a world of living colors. The weak-willed ‘Paler’ and the strong-willed ‘Color’ live here. Today's protagonist, the orange-colored 'Vermillia', is falsely accused of being the devil by someone's rumor, and becomes the target of the Paler and Color. What will happen to Vermillia in the future?
